snippet: The Food and Drug Administration issued a warning on Wednesday after three children died from respiratory arrest caused by regular doses of codeine after surgery to treat sleep apnea.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration issues a warning after three children die from respiratory arrest caused by regular doses of codeine after surgery to treat sleep apnea.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration issued a warning on Wednesday after three children died from respiratory arrest caused by regular doses of codeine after surgery to treat sleep apnea.

headline.main: Warning Issued on Codeine for Children
headline.print_headline: Warning Issued On Codeine for Children
